de.griefed.serverpackcreator

Class ServerPackCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.ServerPackCreator

  • public class ServerPackCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Launch-class of ServerPackCreator which determines the mode to run in, takes care of initialization and dependency injection and, finally, running ServerPackCreator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerPackCreator(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initialize ServerPackCreator and determine the CommandlineParser.Mode to run in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Ensures serverpackcreator.db exists.

      Check for old config file, if found rename to new name.
      boolean checkServerFilesFile(java.io.File fileToCheckFor)
      Checks for existence of defaults files.
      void run()
      Run ServerPackCreator with the mode acquired from CommandlineParser.
      void run(CommandlineParser.Mode modeToRunIn)
      Run ServerPackCreator in a specific CommandlineParser.Mode.
      void updateCheck()
      Check for update-availability and exit with status code 0.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerPackCreator

        public ServerPackCreator(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initialize ServerPackCreator and determine the CommandlineParser.Mode to run in.
        Parameters:
        args - Commandline arguments with which ServerPackCreator is run. Determines which mode ServerPackCreator will enter and which locale is used.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Run ServerPackCreator with the mode acquired from CommandlineParser.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the run fails.

      • run

        public void run(CommandlineParser.Mode modeToRunIn)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Run ServerPackCreator in a specific CommandlineParser.Mode.
        Parameters:
        modeToRunIn - CommandlineParser.Mode to run in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the run fails.

      • checkForConfig

        public boolean checkForConfig()
        Check for old config file, if found rename to new name. If neither old nor new config file can be found, a new config file is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated, so we can inform the user about said newly generated file.

      • checkServerFilesFile

        public boolean checkServerFilesFile(java.io.File fileToCheckFor)
        Checks for existence of defaults files. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Parameters:
        fileToCheckFor - The file which is to be checked for whether it exists and if it doesn't, should be created.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated, so we can inform the user about said newly generated file.

      • checkDatabase

        public void checkDatabase()
        Ensures serverpackcreator.db exists. If the database does not exist, it is created.

      • updateCheck

        public void updateCheck()
        Check for update-availability and exit with status code 0.
